root.cult: Cult Member. There are 2 types of people tonight, cult members and occult specialist. You will want to pretend to be an occult specialist. Your goal is to gain power and take out everyone else who is not cult member. More details will occur at the party.
root.human: Occult Specialist. You specialize in the unnatural. Tonight will put your skills to the test. Your goal is to solve the cursed puzzles and take out the cult members. Keep your eyes and ears open for the unknown. More details will occur at the party.
